Title: Books
Important Commands: write, read, erase, kiss
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach | Books in Castle Marrach are full of information on guilds, history and more. You may even want to write your own. You can obtain blank books from the Chroniclers.
} In order to write on the cover of your book type, $(udat.chatchar)WRITE ON COVER "MY JOURNAL". To write on pages you must specify the exact page you wish to write. If you write on a page already written upon, the new text is appended to the previous text. To write on page one type, $(udat.chatchar)WRITE ON FIRST PAGE "DEAR JOURNAL," or you can write on page twelve by typing, $(udat.chatchar)WRITE ON TWELFTH PAGE "TODAY I HAD A SNOWBALL FIGHT" or to write on the final page type, $(udat.chatchar)WRITE ON LAST PAGE "THE END." Each book contains up to 16 pages.
To read your book type, $(udat.chatchar)READ COVER or $(udat.chatchar)READ FIRST PAGE or $(udat.chatchar)READ SIXTEENTH PAGE.
To erase the cover or pages type $(udat.chatchar)ERASE COVER or $(udat.chatchar)ERASE SEVENTH PAGE.
To seal a book to prevent revisions type $(udat.chatchar)KISS BOOK. To unseal a book, kiss it again. Only the player who originally sealed. a book can unseal it.
You can also RECITE books out-loud.
See Also: scrolls, recite
